title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.5 - Removal of directors and officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.5 - Removal of directors and officers

State Regulations

Directors and officers of any mutual trust investment
company shall be subject to removal, under Banking Law, section 41, with the
same force and effect as if mutual trust investment companies were specifically
mentioned in such section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
